div.head: 運絕
div.div: [brain] movement with a cut off [qi flow]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: [brain] movement with a cut off [qi flow]

sense.def: Illness Sign of dizziness and loss of consciousness following a severe form of vertigo. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 80: 產時出血過多，血虛氣極，因此而運絕也 , “If during delivery she loses too much blood, so that there is an extreme depletion of blood and qi, this will result in [brain] movement with a cut off [qi flow] ”.
